about: Rust Software Developer ( Rust programmer , dedicated Rust Developer , Rust Engineer ) whatever the title based in Egypt
Started my career with Rust, although it is not easy in the Middle East to start with some new techs as an entry-level
Regularly, can help debug, maintain, and develop new features for Rust projects
Most of my experience with Rust has been on the backend, using tools such as Ubuntu, KVM, vscode, Nvim, Postgres, actix-web, Diesel, SQLx, and more
Committed to mastering Rust, I seek opportunities to excel in its ecosystem and contribute to its growth
